title: Brain Cells In A Dish Play Pong And Other Brain Adventures
description: The world of brain research had two incredible developments last week. Researchers have taught a dish of brain cells to play the video game Pong to help develop more intelligent AI. Separately, scientists transplanted human brain organoids into a living animal with the hope of using them as models of human disease.  Jon Hamilton talks with host Aaron Scott about this research and its implications.
